'Charging families for their trash might seem like a good idea. It's environmentally friendly and makes sense financially. But it's not that simple. Many families throw away the same amount of trash every week, no matter how much they pay. This is because they pay for the service through their taxes, so it's not like they have a choice.
The real problem is that people throw away too much trash. This means that we need more garbage trucks and workers to take it away. And the government has to pay for the landfills and tipping fees. It's like a big circle: if we don't pay for our trash, we will keep throwing it away.
Some cities have tried charging families for their trash. They give them stickers or tags to put on their trash bags. Only the bags with the stickers get picked up. But, surprisingly, this hasn't worked as well as expected. People just put more trash in their bags, so the weight stays the same. Some people even started throwing their trash away illegally.
The only good thing is that more people started recycling. But this might not be because of the fee. Many people were already recycling before the fee was introduced.
In the end, charging families for their trash might not be the best solution. We need to think about other factors that affect how much trash we throw away, like how much money we have and how much time we have to recycle. We can't just rely on a simple fee to solve the problem.'

Many people are not happy with their jobs. They feel that their work is not valued or understood. Even people who are very good at their jobs can feel unhappy and unfulfilled. This is because work is not just about doing a job, but also about being a person.
We need to think about what we want to get from our work. We want to be happy, have good relationships, and be respected. But many jobs do not give us these things. For example, hotel workers are often very intelligent and lively, but they have low pay and long hours. This is because hotels have not changed much since the old days.
Hotels could be more than just places to sleep. They could be like a United Nations, where people from different countries meet and learn from each other. Hotel staff could use their knowledge to help guests, and guests could learn about different cultures. But this would require hotel owners to change their way of thinking.
Work is a relationship between people. It's not just about doing a job, but about being with others and communicating with them. We need to learn how to talk to each other in a way that is respectful and understanding. This is important because it helps us feel equal and valued.
We need to rethink what we mean by "work" and what we want to get from it. We want to be happy, fulfilled, and respected. We want to be able to talk to each other and learn from each other. This is the key to a better life.

'Broadcasting' comes from the idea of sowing seeds widely. It's not just about farming, but also about spreading good things to many people. The idea of broadcasting is to make sure everyone has the same information and can learn from each other. In the past, people thought that a new technology that sends pictures and sounds through the air would be like a big farm, with one central place sending out information to many people. This idea was popular because it fit with how society was changing. People were moving around more, and it was hard for everyone to be together in one place. So, broadcasting was a way for the government to reach everyone with important news and for people to come together and feel connected.
Some people tried to do things differently, like making TV a two-way communication tool like a phone. But big companies and governments wanted to control how TV was used, so those ideas didn't work out. TV was mainly used in public places, like cinemas, and people watched it together. This way, TV could be controlled and made into something that made money.
As people's lives changed and they had more money, they wanted to watch TV at home. This made it easy for companies to sell TVs and make money. TV became a way for people to relax and have fun at home. The way TV was organized was good for the economy and for governments to reach everyone with important information.
Now, TV is changing, and some people think the word 'broadcasting' might not be needed anymore. But for a long time, broadcasting was a way for people to share information and come together, and that's still important today.

'Clutter Sometimes, people have too many things and still feel unhappy. It's normal to want a home that meets our needs, but sometimes we buy too much. Advertisers try to make us feel we need things to be happy. Try not to read advertisements next time you're out. These messages can influence us without us realizing it.
We see advertisements everywhere: TV, radio, newspapers, magazines, posters, and the internet. They tell us to buy, buy, buy. 
Caves are interesting and mysterious. Scientists have studied them for a long time to learn more about them. People who visit caves for fun also help with the research.
Weather forecasting used to be done by people who used their senses. Now we have satellites and computers that help us predict the weather. But human experience is still important. People's observations can help scientists understand the weather better.'

'Music and Theatre
I used to think that opera is mainly about theatre. But now I know it's actually about music first. That's how it should be. I come from a world where words and actors are important. There is no one directing the show once it starts, and the performers and audience speak the same language. When I go to a concert or opera, I see that many people don't understand music. Some are embarrassed, while others are amazed by the performers' skills. Even a good musician has worked hard to achieve their talent.
In contrast, theatre audiences have different expectations. They don't always understand how actors do their job and aren't always impressed by what they do. They might ask how actors remember all their lines. This doesn't mean theatre audiences are better or worse than concert audiences. They are just different.
I think music could learn from theatre about how to connect with the audience. Music is already theatrical, with passion, humor, and emotion. But the way music is presented often emphasizes the difference between the performers and the audience. This can feel unfair.
There are many people working to make music more accessible and to break down barriers. I saw a great example of this when a community opera was performed in a cathedral and then in the town. It was a fantastic experience, and the musicians were amazing. Maybe what I want from music is a bit more risk-taking and creativity, like theatre can be. Sometimes this means performing in unusual places, which can be surprising and exciting. I love both music and theatre, and I want both to be successful and enjoyable for everyone.'

I don't like sand very much. It's hard and uncomfortable to walk on, and it gets everywhere. It gets in my food, and it's hard to clean up. When I'm at the beach, I try to stay on the towel or get out of the sand as soon as I can. But even then, it stays with me for a long time. I don't like sand.
People have always wanted to have a safe and secure home. We use locks to keep our homes safe. Some locks are electronic, but many people prefer the old-fashioned kind that use a key. It's like having a secret code that only you know. Recently, some companies made a new electronic lock that has a metal key. It's a mix of old and new.
I'm not very good at understanding modern art. I like some of it, like pictures with fur or neon lights. But I don't always know what it means. The new Tate Modern gallery is trying to help people understand modern art better. They have labels that explain what the art is trying to say. It's helpful, but it's not always easy for me to understand.

Making movies from books is a difficult process. It involves cutting out some parts and changing others to make it work on the screen. This can be frustrating, but it can also be interesting. I recently worked on a script and saw how much dialogue and description I could cut out while still getting the same message across.
Movies and books are different. Books need more details to help readers understand, while movies need to show more and tell less. This doesn't mean the extra details in books are unnecessary. They help readers remember things and understand the characters better.
Movies can make us feel like we are part of the story. It's like being in a different world. But when the movie is over, we go back to our normal life. We don't feel responsible for the time we spent watching the movie.
Some people don't think movies are a real art form. They just see them as entertainment. But many people love movies and try to make them.
The Leiper Film Company's studios were a confusing place. There were many small rooms that looked the same, and it was hard to find what you needed. But the people who worked there knew where everything was and could find their way around easily.
Many people want to make movies. There are books and courses to help them learn how. Some people even make movies with just a small camera and a lot of hard work. One person, Robert Rodriguez, made a movie for just $7,000 and became a famous director.
In the past, movie directors took time to learn their job. They worked behind the scenes and made small movies before making big ones. But now, with the help of the internet and technology, people can make movies faster and more easily.

I grew up in a place called West Earlham. The houses there were old and not very nice. In the summer, a bad smell came from a factory nearby. I don't remember much from when I was little, but I do remember sitting on a high chair and looking at the houses getting smaller and smaller. My mom was a strict person who liked things to be perfect. She was always angry and I didn't know why. Sometimes she would take me to the shops or on trips to the city. I knew she was different from other people.
I had a hard time understanding my mom's rules. She wanted me to be good and not make mistakes. She didn't like it when I played in other people's gardens or talked too much. She liked to listen to the radio and sit quietly. My mom had some friends who were also strict and didn't like to talk much. They would talk about boring things like the weather and their problems.
I felt like I was stuck under a heavy weight, with my mom and her friends and the rules she made. I wanted to be free, but it was hard. When I was little, I just played at home or went to school. I didn't like school, but I liked the summer holidays. I would see old men who told stories and go to fairs where they gave out lemonade. My mom didn't like some things, like people asking for money. She thought politicians were bad. She took me to the museum on Sundays and we would look at paintings. She was trying to teach me, but she didn't know how to have fun. Once, she made a joke about a painting of a Roman soldier, but it was a rare moment.

I walked down Philadelphia Avenue on the side with odd numbers. The sun was setting, and the air was humid and misty. I knew this street from when I was a child. There were many houses and shops, and I had friends who lived there. As I walked, I noticed that the houses got smaller and the yards got smaller too. Over time, some houses that were once homes became shops, and some shops became homes again.
I visited a friend who lives in a big, open space that used to be a curtain warehouse. He wanted to make it feel like a home, so he put up a big plastic sheet to divide the space. He also added a kitchen and some furniture that his parents gave him. He likes to have friends over and cook for them.
I also thought about a famous writer named Bruce Chatwin. He loved to travel and write about his adventures. He wrote a book called "In Patagonia" that is very famous. But sometimes he made things up to make the story more interesting.
One summer, it rained a lot, and I liked swimming in my pool. I would swim up and down and look at the water level. The rain made the water look like it was rising up to meet the sky. I thought about swimming a long way to follow the rain and see where it goes. Swimming is a way to get away from the usual routine and feel free.
Most of us live in a world where everything is labeled and explained. But swimming, walking, and cycling are ways to get away from all that and feel like we're in a wild, natural world.

Charles Darwin thought that people crying didn't serve a purpose. But scientists now think differently. Crying helps us connect with others. A doctor named John Bowlby said that crying helps children and their mothers get close. Many people think that crying is a way to show that we need help. But why do we still cry as adults? It's not just the sound of crying that matters, but the way it looks. Crying might have helped our ancestors feel safe and connected to each other. We might cry to show sympathy for people who are suffering. We might also cry when we hear something beautiful or sad. We might cry when we watch a sad movie, but this is more likely to happen when we're with others. It's clear that crying helps us connect with others, but scientists are still learning more.

The Earth is getting warmer. This is called global warming. We know it's happening, but we're not sure how much warmer it will get and how it will affect our lives. A warmer climate means changes to the weather everywhere in the world. This will have big effects on plants, animals, water, and soil.
We use the Earth's natural resources to live. We produce food, build cities, and support a lot of people. Any changes to these resources are important. We don't know exactly how the world will change, and we're not sure what's causing the changes.
Some scientists think that the Earth has warmed by about 6°C over the past 100 years. They think this is partly because of human activities that release bad things into the air. We don't fully understand the Earth's climate system, but we know it's complex.
Scientists use computers to try to predict what will happen when the Earth gets warmer. They use these predictions to learn about the future. They think that the Earth will get warmer by 1-3.5°C by the year 2100. They also think that sea levels will rise by 15-95 cm and that there will be more extreme weather events like heatwaves, floods, and droughts.
Changes to the climate can affect where plants and animals live, the types of plants and animals that live there, and how we get food and water. Some places will be affected badly, but others might be better. For example, some areas might get more rain and be good for farming.
However, many places will be affected badly. Rising sea levels will cause flooding and damage to homes and cities. Many people will lose their homes and livelihoods, and this could create many environmental refugees. Some small island nations might even disappear.
Please note that I've kept the main ideas and facts from the original text, but simplified the language and sentence structure to make it easier for an A2 learner to understand.

'Mission to Mars: We are looking for a married couple in their middle age to go on a 501-day trip to Mars. They must be strong and healthy. This could be the first time humans will travel to Mars if a rich man named Dennis Tito's plan works. The plan is to send a special capsule to about 160 km above Mars. The capsule will use Mars' gravity to come back to Earth without using too much fuel. This is important because we want to save fuel. The next time Mars and Earth are close together is in 2031, so we have to hurry. It's a big challenge, but it's worth it because we will learn new things that will help us on future trips to space.'
I changed the text to make it more accessible to an A2 learner by:
* Simplifying vocabulary (e.g. "physically and emotionally robust" became "strong and healthy")
* Reducing complex sentences (e.g. "the spacecraft will use the gravity of Mars to allow it to return to Earth without burning any more fuel" became "the capsule will use Mars' gravity to come back to Earth without using too much fuel")
* Removing technical terms (e.g. "fuel efficiency" and "launch window")
* Making the language more concrete and easy to understand (e.g. "the next time Mars and Earth are close together is in 2031" instead of "the next launch window when Mars and Earth align again isn't until 2031")
* Breaking up long sentences into shorter ones for easier reading.

Art is often difficult to understand because we think of it as something separate from our everyday lives. We think of art as a painting, a book, or a statue, and we separate it from the people who created it and the experiences it gives us. This makes it hard to understand the true meaning of art.
Art is not just something we see and admire; it is something that happens in our daily lives. It is like a mountain, which is not just a physical object, but a part of the earth. To understand art, we need to think about the everyday things that happen around us, like our emotions, our relationships, and our experiences.
We don't need to be experts to enjoy art. We can enjoy a beautiful sunset, a good meal, or a funny joke. But to truly understand art, we need to think about why we enjoy these things and how they make us feel.
Many people think that art is only for special occasions, like going to a museum or a concert. But art is all around us, even in things we don't usually consider art, like movies, music, or comics. When we connect art to our everyday lives, we can appreciate it more and understand its true meaning.

**Lions**
Lions are amazing animals. They work together to hunt for food. They are like a team. But, after many years of studying them, we have a different idea. We thought that lions would work together because it would help them survive. But, sometimes, when one lion helps another, it might not help itself. So, why do lions still work together? We thought we would find the answer quickly, but it took a long time. Lions are very good at doing nothing. It took many years to learn about their behavior.
**Pop Music**
A band called Bedrock made a very good album called New Life. This album changed the way music was made in the UK for a long time. The music was lighter and more fun. The band was good at mixing different styles and writing songs. They wrote songs about everyday things, like sunbathing and Sundays. The album is very good and has no bad songs.
**Personal Story**
When I was a child, I was fascinated by a story about a wise woman who could predict the future. She was very smart and knew many things. My mother told me this story, and it taught me an important lesson about being good at selling things. I also learned that sometimes, it's good to do something interesting so that others want to join in. When I grew up, I wanted to write a book about travel, but I didn't want to go to many places. I like to travel in my mind and learn about the past.
**Writing a Book**
When you write a book, you usually send it to a publisher. The publisher has a big pile of books to read, and it might take a long time for your book to be read. The person who reads your book is usually a young editor or an older editor who comes in a few days a week. They want to find a new and interesting book. If they like your book, they will pass it to a more important editor, and eventually, it will be accepted or rejected. The editor will also think about whether you are a good writer and whether your book can be sold well.

Here is a simplified version of the passage at the A2 level:
Advertising was a tough time in the 1990s. The economy was bad, and many businesses were struggling. In the UK, the economy was getting worse, and many people lost their jobs. Companies were spending less money, and advertising agencies were under a lot of pressure.
Advertising agencies are responsible for helping companies sell their products. They have to come up with good ideas for ads and make sure they are shown to the right people. But in the 1990s, they were facing many challenges. They had to work with smaller budgets, and many companies were questioning whether advertising was worth the cost.
Some companies were not sure if they were getting a good return on their investment in advertising. They wanted to see better results, and they were looking for ways to make their ads more effective. This was a difficult time for advertising agencies, and many people in the industry were worried about their jobs.
The situation was made even more complicated by demographic changes, changes in consumer behavior, and new laws and regulations. It was a challenging time for advertising agencies, and many people were struggling to come up with good ideas for ads.
In this difficult environment, it was hard for advertising agencies to produce high-quality ads that worked well. Many companies were keeping their strategies and ideas secret, so it was hard for others to learn from their successes and failures. As a result, there were few resources available to help advertising agencies improve their work.
This simplified version maintains the main ideas and themes of the original passage, but uses simpler vocabulary and sentence structures to make it more accessible to an A2 level learner.

Here is a simplified version of the passage, adapted for a level A2 learner:
When I was at university, I decided I wanted to be a chef. My friends thought this was strange because cooking is not a popular job. People often think that chefs have a hard and stressful life. But I didn't care. I was unhappy at university. The work was difficult, and the social life was not interesting. Being a chef seemed like a good way to escape all that. I also loved cooking because it's an art. I had a great experience when I ate at a famous restaurant in London. The food was amazing, and I felt happy for days afterwards. After that, I wanted to learn more about cooking. I read cookbooks, went to markets, and cooked big meals. My studies became less important to me.
I also learned how to dive. The instructor was a strict man who taught me how to dive from a high board. He was very serious and told me to look up and keep my legs straight. I felt scared, but I tried my best. When I jumped into the water, I felt free and happy. Even though I didn't do it perfectly, I felt proud of myself.
Some people like to travel and take risks. They might climb mountains, sail in the sea, or live in the wilderness. These people are very brave and interesting. But for most of us, it's hard to understand why they would want to do these things. We prefer a comfortable life with a warm bed, running water, and a safe place to live.

Summer is a great time for holidays. We can go to new places and read books. Reading books can help us feel more at home in the world. We can find books that describe things we have experienced or thought about. Authors can use words to explain how we feel, and this can be very helpful.
When we travel, we meet new people and see new things. This can help us open our eyes to things we didn't notice before. We start to pay attention to small things, like the sky, people's faces, and the way things are.
I wrote these travel articles for a newspaper over seven years. I didn't change much, just a few small things to make it fit on the page. I also corrected some mistakes.
Some people like to travel and help the environment. This is called ecotourism. But it's hard to know what it really means, because it can be used to sell anything. It's like a big jungle!
I also wrote about my trip to Transylvania. I lost my notebook for 50 years, but it was found and helped me remember my trip. I stayed in many nice houses and had a good time. Sometimes I didn't write much, because I thought there was nothing important to write about. But now I'm writing a book about my trip, and I'm not worrying about getting things in the right order.

Fashion has been around for a long time, even before the 19th and 20th centuries. Many fashion historians say that fashion started when people began to trade and buy clothes. As societies grew and people had more things to wear, the meanings of clothes changed. Today, it's hard to know what something means just by looking at it. For example, a man's suit can mean different things to different people.
As for writers, it's not easy to make a living. Some writers have other jobs and write in their free time. Others, like me, do odd jobs and write articles to make ends meet. I've heard of writers working for companies, but I've never had that chance.
Suddenly, our band became famous. We were playing at small venues and they were all sold out. We had to use secret entrances to get to the stage and fans were following us everywhere. It was hard to leave the house without being mobbed. In a few days, we were famous. People were watching our every move and taking care of our needs. I was shy, but I felt a strange confidence that only comes from being in a situation like that. But I was still out of my depth.
I made some changes to the text to make it easier for an A2 learner to understand, such as:
* Simplifying vocabulary and sentence structures
* Removing complex sentences and phrases
* Breaking up long paragraphs into shorter ones
* Using more concrete examples to explain abstract concepts
* Removing references to specific industries or companies (e.g. "chocolate factory")
* Focusing on the main ideas and leaving out some of the details.

Music in the Future
Music is an important part of our lives. We listen to it, play it, and enjoy it. Technology has changed the way we experience music. We can now listen to music on our phones, computers, and tablets. This has made it easier for people to enjoy music. However, it has also meant that fewer people are going to concerts and listening to live music.
In the past, people used to listen to music on the radio, TV, records, and CDs. Now, we have many more ways to listen to music. This has made music more accessible to everyone. But, it has also meant that fewer people are learning to play musical instruments.
Music is important for many reasons. It brings people together, helps us express ourselves, and makes us happy. It is also important for our brains. Research has shown that playing a musical instrument can help us think better and be more focused.
In the future, music will continue to be important. People will still want to listen to music and play instruments. But, the way we do things might change. We might see new types of music and new ways of making music. Technology will play a big role in this.
To prepare for the future, music teachers will need to adapt. They will need to teach people of all ages and abilities. They will need to be good communicators and able to work with people from different backgrounds.
Music is important, but it is often taken for granted. People who work in the music industry need to work together to make sure music is valued and appreciated.

Actors often get criticized. Sometimes, they even criticize themselves when talking about their work. But it's hard to talk about acting without making it sound boring or fake. A famous actor, Paul Scofield, said that an actor's work is only interesting when they're performing it. When they talk about it, it becomes empty and uninteresting.
A review of a play, Hamlet, says that the actor, Adrian Lester, did a great job. He played the main character, Hamlet, with confidence and skill. He made the character seem real and relatable.
So, what is acting? Is it just imitating someone or something, or is it bringing something to life? This is a big question about the theatre.
One way to prepare for a play is to start by reading the script and thinking about the words. Then, when it's time to perform, the actors think about what the words mean to them and why they want to say them. This helps them find the right emotions and feelings.
The perfect theatre is one that makes you feel like you're a part of the performance. The actors and staff should all work together to create a special atmosphere. The theatre itself should be designed to make you feel close to the action on stage. It's important to have a sense of history and tradition in the theatre, too.
It's hard to know what people will like in a play, so you can't try to please everyone. When you go to the theatre, you want to see something new and exciting, something that you can't imagine seeing anywhere else.

Rock and roll music in the 1950s was popular among young people, but it also changed the way middle-aged people listened to music. It paved the way for new rock stars. Paul Simon, a young musician, listened to rock and roll on the radio. He heard it on a show called Moondog Rock'n'Roll Party. The show was very popular among young musicians.
Paul Simon was inspired by the music and wanted to make his own music. He didn't know how to start, but he was determined to try. He walked in the snow, but it was slippery and he fell into a hole. He got out of the hole and sat down to think about what to do. He realized he had to change his plan.
There are many books about doing research, but they don't explain how to analyze the data. Some researchers are willing to share their experiences, but it's not easy. We asked some researchers to tell us about their experiences analyzing data. We want to help others understand the process better.

I saw my six-year-old son eating noodles in a funny way. He was pretending to be a dinosaur. He was copying a TV show. I asked him about dinosaurs, but he didn't know much. Some people think it's good to use computers and the internet to learn, but is it really helpful? One man tried an interactive program with his son. The father read the words, but the son just played with the pictures. The father thought his son might have learned more if he had read a book instead.
Television is not a good way to learn because it's not like talking to a teacher or a parent. We need someone to help us learn. It's okay to use new technology to teach our children, but we also need schools.
Hollywood is a famous place in the United States. It was once a small town, but now it's a big city. People come from all over the world to make movies. Everyone in Hollywood talks about movies and who's famous.
Photography is a way to take pictures. It was invented a long time ago by artists who wanted to capture their surroundings. They used special machines to make pictures that looked real. Some people didn't think photography was art because it was too easy. But photographers knew they had created something new and special.
Book illustrations are pictures in books. A long time ago, all children's books had pictures. But now, some books don't have pictures. Some artists drew pictures for children's books, and these pictures are valuable. People are starting to appreciate these old pictures again and are putting them on display.

**Sharing Secrets on the Internet**
Some time ago, a website talked about the risks of sharing where you are on the internet. The website said that when you tell people where you are, you're also telling many others who might not be people you want to meet. This made people think about the downsides of sharing everything online.
The internet gives us many opportunities to share our lives with a huge number of people. We can share photos, stories, and secrets. But sometimes we realize that the internet is like a big ocean, and we can get lost in it. It's like being in a crowd and not knowing where to go.
A long time ago, some brave people started sharing their lives online. They wrote about their jobs, their friends, and their lives. They showed us that it's possible to share our lives online, but we need to be careful.
One of these pioneers was a young man named Justin Hall. He started sharing his life on the internet in 1994. He wrote about his daily life, including his relationships and his feelings. He even shared photos and art. People loved reading about his life, and he became famous.
But Justin's story took a surprising turn. He fell in love, and his partner didn't like him sharing their relationship online. Justin had to choose between keeping his blog or losing his partner. He chose to stop writing about his life online.
Another person who shared her life online was Heather Armstrong. She wrote about her job and her life on a blog called Dooce. But one day, her boss found out about her blog and fired her. This happened because people can easily share information online, and sometimes it can hurt us.
Heather learned a valuable lesson. She realized that what we share online can affect our real lives. She stopped writing about her life online for a while, but then started again, this time focusing on her family. Today, she is a successful blogger and writer.
Heather's story teaches us that we need to be careful when sharing our lives online. We can say anything we want online, but that doesn't mean we should. We need to think about how our online actions can affect our real lives.

Many people today are tired and sleep-deprived. This is because they are busy and have a lot to do. Research has found that 40 million Americans are not getting enough sleep. Some famous books have even featured characters who can't sleep.
Sleep is important for our bodies and minds. We need to sleep to feel rested and refreshed. But many people don't get enough sleep because they wake up early to avoid traffic or rush hour.
A sleep researcher did an experiment. He let people sleep for 14 hours a night for a month. After three weeks, they started sleeping for 8-9 hours a night. This shows how important sleep is for our bodies.
In Europe, there is a special sleep laboratory where scientists study sleep. They test how sleep affects people's bodies and minds. They also study how noise, like traffic, can affect sleep.
The scientists use a special car simulator to test how people drive after not sleeping well. They find that even after just one night without sleep, people can still drive safely if they drink two cups of coffee.
We know that humans sleep in a daily cycle, switching between different stages of sleep. We also know that women sleep for longer than men and that older people need less sleep. But we are not sure why.
Some scientists think that sleep helps our bodies repair themselves, but this might happen while we are awake too. We also don't know exactly what sleep is for, but some scientists think it's like traveling through time without getting hurt.
In the past, people used to sleep differently. They would sleep for a few hours, wake up, and then go back to sleep. This was a time for reflection and relaxation. Today, most people sleep for a solid night, but in some parts of the world, people still sleep in short bursts throughout the night.
Overall, people all around the world need more sleep to feel rested and refreshed.

I'm wearing big, expensive cowboy boots. They cost $800 each. I'm trying to be a cowboy, but I'm not really one. I'm standing in the Arizona desert, looking at the mountains. I feel out of place. I flew in from Denver early in the morning, and I thought I might be a real cowboy. But then I saw a real cowboy at the airport. He was wearing a dirty T-shirt and carrying a bag. He looked at my boots and walked away.

'Flying in Space without Gravity
I, Tom Mumford, went on a special flight with 13 students from Europe and America. We were on a big plane called a Boeing KC-135. It looked like a normal plane, but inside it was different. There were no windows, and it was lit up with special lights. We sat down in the back, and some of us were a bit scared. We had been chosen to be on this flight because we had come up with good ideas for experiments in space.
The plane went up, up, up, and then down, down, down. This made us feel weightless for a few seconds. We floated around and had to hold onto things to stop ourselves from floating away. It was like being on a big trampoline!
We did some experiments during the flight. Some students studied how things move in space, while others looked at how to make special solar sails that can use the sun's light to move. It was a really cool experience.
After the flight, we felt happy and excited. One of the students said, "I already wanted to be an astronaut, but now I want to even more!" We all had a great time and will never forget our adventure in space.'

I had a special experience in New Zealand. I went there every winter for nine years. My parents bought a small piece of land for my brother, sister, and me to take care of. They said we could have it if we planted trees on it. My dad was born in New Zealand, so it was a special connection for us.

Dr. Toby Clark is a researcher at the British Geological Survey. He wants to follow in the footsteps of Sir Edmund Halley, a famous astronomer. Every summer, peacocks at Whipsnade Wild Animal Park in England show off their beautiful tails to the hens. The hens look at the peacocks and choose the ones with the most beautiful tails. This is a mystery that has puzzled scientists for a long time. How do the peacocks get away with having such beautiful tails?
A long time ago, a scientist named Charles Darwin thought that animals became the way they are because of a process called evolution. He believed that animals with the best features were more likely to survive and have babies. But the peacocks' tails don't seem to be very useful. They are heavy and make it hard for the peacocks to run away from predators.
Another scientist, Alfred Wallace, thought that the hens might like the peacocks' tails because they are beautiful. He believed that the hens could see something in the peacocks that we can't.
Now, scientists are trying to figure out why the hens like the peacocks' tails. They are studying the peacocks at Whipsnade and have found that the hens really do like the peacocks with the most beautiful tails. The peacocks with the most beautiful tails have more eye-spots on their tails, and the hens like that.
Some scientists think that the peacocks with the most beautiful tails might be healthier or stronger than the others. They are studying the babies of the peacocks with the most beautiful tails to see if they grow faster or are healthier.
There is one more idea that scientists are exploring. They think that the hens might have started liking the peacocks' tails because one hen picked a peacock with a slightly better tail than the others. The sons of that peacock would have inherited his tail, and the daughters would have inherited the mother's preference for long tails. Over time, the peacocks with the longest tails would get more mates and have more babies, and the hens would prefer longer and longer tails.
This is a complex problem, but scientists are working to figure out why the hens like the peacocks' tails.

We are very similar to chimpanzees. In fact, we are 98% identical to them. This means that any differences between us and animals are very recent. Our bodies and brains are slightly different, but not much. We think that art is something that makes us special, but is it really?
Some animals, like chimpanzees, make tools and use them to help them survive. They even use sticks to eat and fight. Some monkeys have a simple language with different sounds for different things, like "leopard" or "snake". This makes us wonder what makes human art different.
We used to think that humans were the only ones who made art, but now we know that animals do too. For example, some animals use rocks to open shells and eat the food inside. They even make art for fun, like painting and drawing.
We used to think that human art was special because it was made for beauty and not for a specific purpose. But some animals make art for fun too. They don't make it to help them survive or to communicate with others, they just make it because they enjoy it.
We also thought that human art was special because it was learned and not instinctive. But some animals learn to make art too. For example, some birds learn to sing songs that are passed down from their parents.
In the end, it's hard to say what makes human art truly unique. Maybe it's just that we humans have a special way of making art that is different from animals. But even that is not clear.

The Taklamakan Desert in western China is a very difficult place to explore. Charles Blackmore went there and lived to tell the story. He led a group of people across the desert, including four Britons, an American, four Chinese, and 30 camels. They had never worked with camels before, but they were good drivers. The group wanted to cross 1,200 kilometers of the desert, but it was a big challenge.
Charles Blackmore was in the army for 14 years, but he wanted to do something different. He wanted to see who he was outside of the army. His wife was worried that he wouldn't come back, but they went ahead anyway. It took them 59 days to cross the desert.
The group had many problems, like dysentery, extreme heat and cold, and not enough water. But they were lucky and found some water when they needed it. They didn't have any help, and they had to work very hard to survive.
Charles Blackmore was very scared at the beginning, but he kept going. He wanted to survive and make it to the end. When they finally finished, he felt very proud of himself. He thought about his family and how happy they were, and that made him feel even prouder.
Charles Blackmore likes the desert because it's a big challenge. He likes the feeling of being in the open spaces and having a sense of purpose. He misses that feeling now that he's back to his normal life.

People sleep a lot. It's clear that sleep is important. But what it does is still a mystery. Scientists don't agree on why we sleep so much. There are three main ideas about this. One idea is that sleep helps our bodies stay healthy. It's like our bodies are fixing any problems they made during the day while we sleep. Another idea is that sleep helps us learn new things. This theory says that our brains work while we sleep to help us remember what we learned during the day. Without sleep, we wouldn't be able to learn. The third idea is that sleep helps us have energy for the next day. It's like our bodies need to recharge like a battery to have enough energy to do things.

Eccentrics are people who do things that are not normal. But what is normal? We all have things that make us different from others. Maybe you like collecting stamps or playing a special game. These things make us who we are.
Inside us, there are two forces. One is the desire to be like everyone else and the other is the desire to be different. Most of the time, the force that wants to be like everyone else is stronger. We want to be accepted and liked by others.
People who are different often find others like them. They join clubs or groups to talk about their interests. They like being with others who understand them.
We all have a mix of these two forces inside us. Sometimes we want to fit in and sometimes we want to stand out. We might say things like "I am who I am" or "I do what I want". But we can also choose to be more ourselves and be different.
Some people become famous by being themselves. Bob Dylan, a famous singer, said that if you do what you love and don't give up, you will be different. But being eccentric is not just about doing something unusual. It's about being natural and not caring what others think. Eccentrics are not trying to be odd, they just are. They do what they do because it's who they are.

DO REVIEWS HELP SELL BOOKS? We asked five big book publishers in Britain about how important book reviews are for selling books. Here's what they said.
Publisher A Reviews are very important for us. Many people buy books because of good reviews. Authors and publishers both want good reviews, but authors are more upset if they get bad reviews. Publishers think that even bad reviews can help sell books because they make people curious.
Publisher B Book reviews are important for newspapers and magazines. They want to make their readers happy. But publishers want to see their own books reviewed, especially if they are good books. Some book reviews are better than others. There are still many books that don't get reviewed, especially paperbacks.
Publisher C Reviews are very important for us. We need them to help people know about our books. We don't advertise much, so reviews are important. Good reviews can help sell books, especially if they are written by famous reviewers.
Publisher D It's hard to understand how reviews affect book sales in Britain. Sometimes, good reviews don't help, and bad reviews don't hurt. Some books that get bad reviews sell well, and some books that get great reviews don't sell at all.

Some reviewers are more important than others, but nowadays, it's not just about who writes the review, but also how interesting and original it is.

I was shy, but my friend encouraged me to go talk to him. I showed him my sketchbook and he signed it. Then, he drew a picture on the page. I was amazed and happy.
After that, I went back to my friend and showed him the signature. He said I should go back and draw Picasso's portrait. I was nervous, but I went back and started drawing. Picasso started making funny faces and acting like a clown. He wanted to see how serious I was about drawing. I was determined to finish the portrait, and eventually, he stopped making faces and let me draw him normally. When I finished, he looked at it and nodded. Then, he drew a portrait of me! I was surprised and happy. He signed the drawing, but only after I asked him to. I was grateful for the experience and felt lucky to have met Picasso.'

**Buying and Shopping**
Have you ever gone to a store and bought more things than you planned to? Stores use special tricks to make us buy more. Let's look at some of these tricks.
**Fresh and Nice Smells**
Supermarkets know that people like fresh food. They put fresh fruit and vegetables near the entrance to make us feel good. They also bake bread in-store to make it smell delicious. The color of the store can also help. For example, green is a fresh color.
**Where to Put Things**
Where things are placed in a store is important. Supermarkets use computers to see which areas people visit most often. They put popular and expensive items in these areas.
**Traps and Temptations**
Some stores put low-priced items far from the entrance. We have to walk past other items to get to them. This makes us see more things and buy more. Some stores also put their best products far from the entrance, so we have to look for them.
**How Stores Look**
Some stores make their products look special by putting them in small groups. This makes us feel like we're getting something exclusive. Some stores also use big displays to show us what we can buy.
**How Much We Pay**
Supermarkets mix low-priced and high-priced items to make us think we're getting a good deal. They might even sell some items at a loss to get us to come into the store. This is called a "loss leader".
**Pricing**
Some stores are very careful about prices. They want us to notice if something is cheaper than usual. They also use prices to make us feel like we're getting a good deal.
**Lighting**
Stores use lighting to make us see things clearly. Supermarkets use special lighting to make fresh food look good. Chainstores use lighting to make clothes look like they do in natural light.
**Paths and Carpets**
Some stores divide their floors with different carpets. This makes us walk along a path and look at the things they want us to see. Some stores use wood or marble for the path to make us feel welcome.
**Advertising**
When we enter a supermarket, we see big pictures of food that looks delicious. Some stores are even testing special shopping carts with screens that show us ads as we shop. This is to make us buy more things on impulse.

Apples have been around for thousands of years. They come in many different shapes, sizes, and colors. But some people are worried that we are losing the variety of apples. 
A long time ago, people ate apples and threw away the seeds. They planted these seeds and grew new apple trees. In ancient times, people in Switzerland and Italy grew apples and dried them to eat in the winter.
In the Middle Ages, people in Europe learned how to grow apples from the Romans. They brought new apple varieties to Britain and grew them in monasteries. The monks experimented and created new apples.
In the 13th century, many types of apples became popular in Britain. One type, called the Old English Pearmain, was eaten as a dessert. Another type, called the Costard, was used for cooking.
Apples were popular in Britain, but then there were many problems like droughts, wars, and diseases. Fewer apples were grown, and more were brought from other countries. 
In the 16th century, a man named Henry VIII wanted to learn about growing apples from the French. He sent a man to France, and they brought back new apple varieties.
When people traveled to new countries, they took apple seeds with them. They planted these seeds and grew new apple trees. In North America, a man named Johnny Appleseed planted many apple trees.
In the 19th century, a farmer in Iowa found a new type of apple growing from the roots of a dead tree. He named it the Delicious apple. It became very popular and is still grown today.
Another famous apple variety was discovered by a woman named Maria Smith in Australia. She found a small tree growing in a pile of rubbish and transplanted it. The tree grew and produced green apples that became famous all over the world.
Today, apples are grown all over the world. But many apples are grown in the same way and have the same taste. This is a problem because it means we are losing the variety of apples. We need to make sure that we protect the diversity of apples and other foods for the future.

The Kenyans train at high altitude, which helps them run better. Richard also ran a race in Kenya, which was the first international cross-country race on African soil. Many Kenyan runners finished ahead of him, but Richard thought he had a good race.
The Kenyans are known for their simple way of training. They don't make it complicated. They run three times a day, with a big run in the morning, some interval training, and another run in the afternoon. They also eat simple food like ugali, stew, and tea.

Advertising is not doing well. It's not just because of the economic recession. Advertising has been in trouble for a long time. The problem is that advertisers are not very good at reaching the right people with their messages.
Most people don't buy many new things every year. We buy some food, clothes, and maybe a new phone or computer. But we don't buy many different brands. In fact, most of us only buy a few hundred brands in a year. But there are thousands of brands advertised every year.
This means that most advertisements are not very effective. People don't pay attention to most ads, and they don't buy the products they advertise. In fact, most people don't even remember the ads they see.
Advertising is a way to reach many people at the same time. But it's not very good at reaching the right people. Advertisers want to reach people who will buy their products, but they can't know for sure who will respond to their ads.
Some advertisers are trying to do better by targeting their ads to specific groups of people. This helps them reach the people who are most likely to buy their products. But even with this, they can't be sure who will respond to their ads.
The best way to advertise is to find the right people and talk to them directly. This is what salespeople do when they sell things face-to-face. But with advertising, it's harder to know who will respond.
Some advertisers are very good at reaching a small number of people and getting them to buy their products. But most advertisers are not very good at this. They need to do better if they want to be successful.

**The Greenest House in Britain**
I visited a special house in Southwell, Nottinghamshire. It's called the "autonomous house". The house is very green, which means it doesn't harm the environment. The owners, Robert and Brenda Vale, designed and built the house themselves. They use rainwater for washing and drinking, and recycle their waste into compost for their garden. They also use the heat from their electrical appliances and their own body heat to warm the house.
The house looks like a normal house from outside, but it's very special inside. It's very quiet because it's well-insulated and has special windows that keep out noise. When you enter the house, you have to take off your shoes because it's very quiet. The house is warm and cozy, even in winter. The Vales use a small wood-burning stove to heat the house, but they don't use it much.
The house is special because it doesn't use much electricity or water. The Vales don't pay any water bills, and they only use a little bit of electricity. They are going to install solar panels soon, which will make them even more energy-independent. The house is also very low-tech, which means there's not much that can go wrong.
The Vales are very proud of their green house and want to show others that it's possible to live in a house that doesn't harm the environment. They wrote a book about green architecture and want to inspire others to build similar houses.

Arthur Conan Doyle was a famous writer who created the character Sherlock Holmes. He thought he was a rational person who liked science. In 1920, he saw some photos of fairies taken in a garden. He believed these tiny creatures really existed. He wrote an article and published the photos. Later, in 1939, the two ladies who took the photos told the truth. They cut out pictures of fairies from a book and put them among flowers. The photos are very nice, but the trick is simple. It shows that the camera is not always honest. We can now use computer software to change our digital photos. This means that photography has never been completely honest. Since cameras started taking pictures, people have been changing reality.

Blacksmiths have been important for a long time. They make things from iron, like tools and weapons. In the past, people thought blacksmiths were very skilled and important. They were like doctors and astrologers. They made beautiful ironwork for buildings like St Paul's Cathedral.
In the past, blacksmiths were not needed as much because machines took over their jobs. But now, people are interested in decorative architecture and design again. This means blacksmiths are needed to make things like gates, balconies, and decorative items.
There is a group called the British Artist Blacksmiths Association (BABA) that wants to promote the blacksmiths' craft. They are having an exhibition at a gallery in Leatherhead, Surrey. The exhibition shows many different ironwork pieces, like bookends, a spiral staircase, and more. The prices range from £90 to over £1,000.
The blacksmiths who made these pieces are very creative and like working with iron. They say it's a challenging material, but also very rewarding. One blacksmith says it's like drawing with metal in space. Another blacksmith likes that iron is soft when it's hot, but hard when it's cold.
Iron has been important for a long time, and it will probably continue to be important for a long time. As long as people like decorative items and want to use iron, blacksmiths will be needed.

I stopped smoking one day, but my colleague was very angry. She said, "Why didn't you stop smoking years ago if it was so easy?" I couldn't explain why I was able to stop smoking so quickly. I went to a stop-smoking session with a group of people. We did some therapy and hypnosis together. I didn't want to stop smoking, but I went to the session to write an article about other people who were trying to quit. I told the counselor that I wasn't going to try to stop smoking because I was only there to write about it. The counselor looked at me strangely. We were allowed to smoke during the session, and most of the time we spent in a room filled with smoke. I noticed that when we were told to smoke, I didn't want to do it, and neither did the others. I think what happened was that the idea of not smoking started to seem attractive. It felt good to think about not being a smoker. It was a secret feeling that was just between me and myself. Stopping smoking was easy. I didn't feel the need to smoke after a few days. I thought it would be hard to work without cigarettes, but it wasn't a problem. The only thing that was hard was doing nothing on weekends. I miss smoking sometimes, but not too much. Now I have to think about what to do in situations where I used to smoke, like eating out or waiting for a plane.

Dorothy Hodgkin was a British scientist who won a very important prize called the Nobel Prize. She is not well-known in the UK, even though she was the only British woman to win this prize. I am writing a book about her life and I want to tell people why she is important. 
When I talk to friends and family about my book, they often don't know who Dorothy Hodgkin is. They might say "Isn't there already a book about her?" But there isn't. She was a remarkable person who lived through many big changes in the world, like women's education and science becoming global. 
Some people think that scientists' lives are boring, but that's not true. Scientists are people too, with families and personal lives. Dorothy Hodgkin was a dedicated scientist who worked hard to solve important problems in medicine. She also had a family and was married to a historian. 
It's surprising that scientists don't have more biographies written about them. Some people think that science is too complicated for ordinary people to understand, but that's not true. Science is like learning a new language or reading a book - it just takes time and effort. 
It's sad that many people don't know about scientists like Dorothy Hodgkin, even though they are very important. I hope that my book will help change this.

Margaret Wilkins is a woman who can find water using a special stick. She is very good at it and many farmers ask for her help when their wells dry up. She works with her husband in a business that drills wells. They use special machines, but Margaret uses the stick to find the water.
The stick is a forked hazel stick, and Margaret holds it above the ground. When she is above water, she feels a strange feeling and the stick moves. She uses this feeling to find the exact spot where the water is. Her husband also uses the stick, and they usually agree on where to drill.
Margaret says that everything in the world vibrates, including water. She thinks that she can sense these vibrations with her stick. Some people think that dowsing is a special kind of intuition.
Margaret is very good at finding water, and she has a long waiting list of customers. She usually finds water between 50 and 70 meters deep. She makes sure that the water is clean and safe to drink.
Margaret uses a pendulum to help her find water on big areas like golf courses. She holds the pendulum still and moves it over a map. When it swings, it means there is water underneath. Then she uses the stick to find the exact spot where the water is.
Margaret is not the only one who can do this. There are many other people who can find water using a stick. Scientists are still trying to understand how it works.

She designs things like brochures and websites. She has to communicate with many people and manage her time well. She likes it when clients like her designs.

Linda is a chauffeur. She drives people around. She gets up early, has breakfast, and then drives to the airport to pick up passengers. She likes recommending good places to eat and drink. She helps solve problems and coordinates with other workers. She likes helping to build things and making sure they are safe. She works long hours and is on call all the time.

**A. Credit Card Executive**
I wake up at 6:00 am and go to the office at 7:30 am. My job is to manage special programs for people who have credit cards. I work with other companies to make sure everything runs smoothly. I spend the first 45 minutes of my day organizing and then answer emails. I meet with my team to plan advertising and make decisions about the future. I have meetings all day, but I'm always available if someone needs to ask me something. Sometimes I travel to other countries to solve problems.
**B. Record Company Executive**
I start work at 10:00 am and go through many demo tapes, letters, and invoices. The phone rings a lot, and I meet with producers, publishers, and other people to discuss music projects. When I listen to demo tapes, I try to be kind and honest. If I like a band, we work together to make an album. I also manage the budget for the album. **C. Sales Director**
I wake up at 8:00 am and drive to work at 9:30 am. I check the post and schedule for the day. I love showing people around our showroom and selling antiques. We buy and sell antiques from £1,000 to £6,000. I work with restorers, picture framers, and paper repairers to fix the antiques. I read the Antiques Trade Gazette during my breaks to stay up-to-date. I do the accounts once a month and tax returns every three months. I go home at 5:30 pm and it takes me about an hour to relax.
**D. Air Traffic Controller**
I work a set schedule, and when I'm on an early shift, I leave the house at 6:00 am. I relieve the night shift and work at one of four control positions in the tower. I work with a team to control aircraft movements. We deal with a lot of planes, especially in summer. It's a stressful job, so I like to take breaks. I want to become a watch manager and eventually the airport manager.
**E. Shop Manager**
If I'm on an early shift, I leave the house at 8:00 am. I get the cash register working and make sure someone is watching the till. I help customers find books and order new ones. I like serving customers, but sometimes they can be annoying. I meet with publishers' reps to discuss new books. I have to decide how many books to order. I close the shop at 5:45 pm, and on my late shifts, I lock up and go home.
**F. Financial Analyst**
I listen to the news at 7:00 am, then take a taxi to work at 8:45 am. I contact reporters to find out what's happening in the region I'm responsible for. I help multinational companies avoid financial problems. I provide three services: a newsflash, a security forecast, and a travel guide. I meet with editors to discuss stories and write my reports. I travel to Africa three times a year to report on events. I leave work at 6:00 pm and often stay up late thinking about my work.

**Getting Ahead at Work**
**What Makes a Good Leader?**
A good leader is someone who inspires others and helps them to achieve their goals. It's not about being tall or smart. A good leader is someone who can motivate others and make things happen.
**Becoming a Leader**
You don't have to be born a leader. You can develop your leadership skills by recognizing your talents and using them. Many people have the potential to be leaders, but they don't realize it.
**The Best and Worst Bosses**
Think about the best and worst bosses you've had. The best boss motivated you and gave you support. The worst boss made you feel like you were just a small part of the team and didn't tell you what was going on.
**Leaders and Managers**
Managers like to work within set rules, while leaders create their own goals. A good manager can keep a company running smoothly, but a good leader can transform a company and make it successful.
**Improving Your Leadership Skills**
You can improve your leadership skills by:
* Finding what you're passionate about and using your energy to lead
* Thinking of yourself as a leader and recognizing your abilities
* Trying different leadership styles and seeing what works best for you
* Setting goals and working towards them
* Learning from your mistakes and improving your communication skills
Remember, leadership is not just about being in charge, it's about inspiring and motivating others to achieve their goals.

**Photographing People**
People are the most interesting subjects to photograph. A picture with someone in it is usually more interesting than one without. But people can be hard to photograph well. You need to think about their actions, gestures, and expressions.
**GROUP SHOTS**
When taking a group picture, don't make everyone stand in a straight line. Ask them to stand at different angles and distances. You can also ask some people to sit or kneel in front so everyone's face is visible.
**POSING FOR PICTURES**
People often don't act naturally in front of a camera. They might look stiff and uncomfortable. Try to relax them by suggesting they do something natural, like folding their hands or putting them in their pockets.
**THE RIGHT APPROACH**
Don't pretend you're not taking a picture when you are. This can make people feel tense or even angry. Most people are happy to have their picture taken and might even feel flattered. But they might become self-conscious, so you might need to guide them.
**EYE CONTACT**
A picture is more interesting if the person is looking at the camera. Ask them to look into the lens, not just smile. They might not be able to do this for long, so remind them just before you take the picture.
**CANDID SHOTS**
An alternative is to have the person focus on something in the picture. This can make the viewer feel like they're observing the person without them knowing.
**EXPRESSIONS AND GESTURES**
A person's expression and gestures can tell us more about them than anything else. Look for familiar expressions like smiling, laughing, or frowning.
**SITUATION INTEREST**
A picture with a interesting background can add more interest to the subject. Try to make the subject stand out by using a wide-angle lens or focusing on them.
**INTERACTION**
Pictures of people interacting with each other, like talking, arguing, or playing, can be very interesting. Look for eye contact or physical contact between the subjects.
**PEOPLE AND PLACES**
When taking pictures of people in a new place, try to show them against the background. Use a standard or wide-angle lens and move back to get the whole scene in the frame.
**TO POSE OR NOT TO POSE?**
Decide why you want to take the picture. If you want a good clear picture, ask the subject to pose against a nice background. But if you want a more natural picture, try to take it when the subject is not expecting it.

**The Key to Success: Emotional Intelligence**
The way we work is changing. We're not just judged on how smart we are or how well we do our job. Now, we're also judged on how well we get along with others and how we handle our emotions.
This is important because it helps us decide who will be good at their job and who won't. It's also important for our future careers. We don't need to be book smart to be good at our job. We need to be good with people.
We used to think that being good at school was the most important thing. But now, it's not enough. We need to be able to work well with others, be kind, and understand each other's feelings. This is called emotional intelligence.
Emotional intelligence is important because it helps us work well with others. It's not just about being nice, but also about being honest and fair. We need to be able to control our emotions and use them to make good decisions.
More and more companies are realizing that emotional intelligence is important. They want their employees to be good with people and to work well together. This is especially important in jobs that are complex and require teamwork.
The good news is that emotional intelligence can be learned. We can get better at handling our emotions and working with others as we get older and learn from our experiences. This is called growing up and becoming more mature.
Emotional intelligence is not a magic formula for success. But if we ignore it, we won't be as successful as we could be.

**Ancient Chinese Medicine: Acupuncture**
Acupuncture is a 2,000-year-old treatment from traditional Chinese medicine. It helps people feel better from pain and other health problems. Doctors in the West use it to treat many conditions, especially back pain, arthritis, and headaches.
**What is Acupuncture?**
Traditional Chinese medicine believes that our body has a special energy called Qi. When Qi flows properly, we feel healthy. But when Qi is blocked, we might feel sick or weak. An acupuncturist uses special needles to help Qi flow properly again.
**How Does it Work?**
The acupuncturist uses fine needles to insert into the skin. They might also use heat or pressure to help the Qi flow. People often feel a gentle ache or tingling sensation when the needle is inserted.
**What Types of Pain Can it Treat?**
Acupuncture can help with many types of pain, such as back pain, arthritis, headaches, and more. Some people even use it to help with menstrual cramps, facial pain, and pain from injuries.
**How Does it Work in Surgery?**
In China, acupuncture is used during some operations to help patients feel less pain. It's a new idea, but it's been used for over 50 years. Acupuncturists say it's a safe and effective way to reduce pain, with fewer side effects than traditional anesthesia.
**Is it Effective?**
Many people find acupuncture helpful, with 50-80% saying it works for chronic pain. Acupuncturists say it's not a one-size-fits-all solution, and people respond differently to treatment.
**A Different Approach**
Acupuncturists look at the whole person, not just the symptoms. They ask about your lifestyle, habits, and feelings to understand the root of the problem. This is different from Western medicine, which often focuses on specific symptoms.
**Choosing an Acupuncturist**
When choosing an acupuncturist, make sure they are qualified and will refer you to a doctor if needed. Some acupuncturists follow traditional Chinese medicine, while others use scientific explanations. Either way, it's important to find a good acupuncturist to help you feel better.

Chewing Gum Culture
Chewing gum is very popular in the United States. Americans chew 12 million sticks of gum every day! Did you know that chewing gum has been around for thousands of years? Let's find out how it became a big business.
Long ago, people chewed a sticky substance from the bark of a special tree called the mastic tree. Greek women liked to use it to clean their teeth and freshen their breath. Later, American colonists started chewing a resin that came from spruce trees. This was the first commercial chewing gum in the United States.
In the 1860s, a new type of chewing gum was discovered. It came from the sap of a tree in Central America. This gum was smoother and more fun to chew. Soon, a whole industry was built around this new type of gum.
But making this gum is not easy. The people who collect the sap have to climb high trees in the rainforest and face many dangers, like snakes and insects. They also have to work in very hot and humid conditions.
As the demand for chewing gum grew, companies started making synthetic gum instead of using the natural sap. Today, most chewing gum is made from synthetic materials. The companies are always trying to come up with new flavors and textures.
Some people think that chewing gum is good for your teeth because it helps increase the flow of saliva, which can help prevent tooth decay. Researchers are still working on new ways to make gum better and more fun to chew.
Did you know that a lot of mint is grown in the United States to make the most popular chewing gums?

I climbed the Seven Summits, the highest peaks on each continent. I'll tell you about each one.
A. Mt. Everest, Asia (8,848m)
We were in a snow cave when my friend Dougal started talking to our guide about sleeping bags. I thought it was strange, as we were alone. Later, I started talking to my feet! The cold was getting into my feet, and I remembered other climbers who lost fingers and toes from frostbite. We were worried about surviving, not just about being alive.
B. Mt. McKinley, North America (6,194m)
This mountain is very difficult. Dougal and I took four days to get to the base. We decided to climb 'alpine style', carrying all our gear. We climbed up a big snow slope and camped under a rocky cliff. We were tired and cold, but we reached the summit.
C. Kilimanjaro, Africa (5,895m)
Paul and I flew to Nairobi and then went to climb Kilimanjaro. We got lost in the jungle, but found a trail of rubbish that led us to a rock pool. We tried to climb a big icicle, but it was too hard, so we took a different route to the summit.
D. Aconcagua, South America (6,960m)
My wife Sharu and I went to Aconcagua with a guide named Phil. We took a different route than usual and walked across a glacier. We saw many people on the path, and it was windy and cold.
E. Vinson Massif, Antarctica (4,897m)
I went to Antarctica with a group to climb Vinson Massif. It was very cold and windy, but we reached the summit within eight hours.
F. Elbrus, Europe (5,633m)
Our group went to Elbrus in Russia. We took a cable car to a high point and then walked to a refuge. We climbed to the summit, but found there was another ridge to climb. We went back to the refuge and descended the next day.
G. Carstensz Pyramid, Australasia (4,883m)
We went to Carstensz to climb and meet the local Dani people. We walked through the jungle and climbed the mountain. We reached the summit and were given a standing ovation.
I hope this helps!

We lived in a valley for 16 months before we realized how dangerous the surrounding hills could be. The year the storms came early, before winter had even started. We felt safe and protected in our valley, surrounded by hills. But then the snow started falling. It was deep and blocked our path and made the stream slippery. The wind was strong on the hills, but we only felt a few gusts in our valley. We knew we had to be careful because the river, the Ryburn, could become a problem. Normally, it flowed gently, but if the snow and rain kept coming, it could flood. We watched as the snow started to melt and the river began to rise. The clouds got darker and more twisted, warning us of what was to come. We kept an eye on the river, which got fuller and wilder every day. The snow was washed away, but the reservoir in the hills was filling up and getting close to overflowing. And then it happened - the reservoir burst and water poured into the stream. The river was furious, and it was deeper than we had ever seen it near our home. We were worried for three days, but luckily the dam held and the water went back down. Before the dam was built, the river used to flood the nearby villages. Now, the dam keeps the water back and we can enjoy the big clouds and the river's power without being afraid. Thanks to the dam, we feel safe in our valley.

Many people collect things. I have always loved collecting too. One in three adults collects something. Collecting is a world of passion, excitement, and joy. But remember, if you don't love something, don't collect it. People have been collecting things for a long time. Even ancient people collected stones and shells because they liked their shapes and colors.
I have been collecting things all my life. I started with stones from my parents' garden. When I was six, I went to a school in a remote place in England. My parents would take me to the local museum, and I loved looking at all the old objects on display. Many people collect things, and the reasons why are interesting. Some people collect because it's the only thing they can control. For me, it's just something I enjoy doing.
There are many famous collectors. One was a French prince who had a room full of strange and interesting objects. Another was a Russian queen who collected over 4,000 paintings. But you don't have to be rich to start a collection. I have collected things like tulip bulbs and china cups. I even searched for 350 American rag dolls, each one different. Unfortunately, my collection of dolls was destroyed in a fire. It was hard to see the remains of my collection.
What's interesting is how collections change hands and how some things become valuable because of who they belonged to. Old toys from the 1950s are now worth a lot of money if you still have the original boxes. I made a mistake by throwing away my old toys and their boxes!
